resources.string: ODK SMS Input allows you to read, parse, and insert SMS messages into ODK 2.0 apps. Once configured, incoming messages will be saved into this app\'s database as well as other ODK apps that have SMS input enabled. Messages are saved into their own table, with the message and sender unparsed. More complicated parsing that allows inserting data into arbitrary tables is also supported. Use this screen to inspect messages that have been processed and to see which installed apps have SMS input enabled.
